item.title: Advanced Labor C-Sections Carry Risk for Cervical Scarring
item.description: Poor healing entails painful complications and impaired fertility, so women need counseling on the risks for future pregnancies. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Gabapentin Now Among Most Prescribed Drugs in US
item.description: Although widely prescribed off-label to treat many types of chronic pain, experts warn of harmful side effects. Medscape Medical News

item.title: International Study Links Psoriasis to Increased Cancer Risk
item.description: Patients with psoriasis face higher risk for several different types of cancer, according to the results of an international study. Medscape Medical N...

item.title: Progesterone Pre-Pregnancy May Lower Miscarriage Risk
item.description: A large study suggests taking progesterone before pregnancy — not just after conception — may help reduce the risk for miscarriage. Medscape Medical N...
